item.title: 中国财报不佳令习近平结束通货紧缩的努力存疑
item.description: 中国政府遏制价格战和抑制通货紧缩的行动对第三季度盈利的提升作用甚微，这使得投资者缺乏催化剂，而中国股市的跌势已延续到第二个月。【原文：Beijing’s campaign to rein in price wars and blunt deflation has done little to lift third-quarter earnings, leaving investors short on catalysts as Chinese stocks extend their losses into a second month.】

item.title: 俄罗斯准备首次发行人民币债券，助推中国的雄心壮志
item.description: 俄罗斯正逐步接近其首次以人民币计价的主权债券销售，这有助于中国提高其货币的全球地位。【原文：Russia is inching closer to its first yuan-denominated sovereign bond sale, aiding China’s push to raise the global standing of its currency.】

item.title: 亚洲开市后将进入繁忙的一周：市场综述
item.description: 继上周五美国股市小幅上涨后，亚洲股市开盘表现相当平淡，交投清淡，投资者继续关注经济数据和美联储降息预期。【原文：Asian stocks were set for a fairly muted open following modest US gains on Friday amid thin trading as investors kept their focus on economic data and an expected Federal Reserve interest-rate cut.】

item.title: 2600 亿美元 "母婴基金 "扭曲信贷市场
item.description:
受个人投资者欢迎的固定期限基金正在囤积大公司的债务，降低借贷成本，但却掩盖了偿还风险。【原文：

Popular with individual investors, fixed-maturity funds are hoovering up the debt of big companies, reducing borrowing costs but obscuring repayment risk.

】

item.title: EQT 和 CVC Asia 放弃对 AUB 的 34 亿美元收购要约
item.description: EQT AB 和 CVC Asia Pacific Ltd. 取消了与 AUB Group Ltd. 就可能的收购要约进行的谈判，该要约对这家澳大利亚保险经纪公司的估值约为 52 亿澳元（34 亿美元）。【原文：EQT AB and CVC Asia Pacific Ltd. scrapped talks with AUB Group Ltd. about a possible takeover offer that had valued the Australian insurance broker at around A$5.2 billion ($3.4 billion).】

item.title: CyrusOne 称，CME 数据中心在故障后增加了更多冷却设备
item.description: 位于伊利诺伊州、为芝加哥商品交易所提供支持的数据中心，在上周五发生震惊全球市场的灾难性故障后，安装了后备冷却能力。【原文：The Illinois-based data center that supports the CME installed backup cooling capacity after a catastrophic outage that roiled world markets on Friday.】

item.title: 遏制儿童使用社交媒体的全球行动从澳大利亚开始
item.description:
对其他国家决策者的采访显示，他们正在密切关注澳大利亚的年龄禁令，并计划采取自己的措施来保护年轻用户。【原文：

Interviews with policymakers in other nations show they’re watching Australia’s age ban closely and planning moves of their own to protect young users.

】

item.title: 美联储竞选人哈塞特称市场已为特朗普主席人选做好准备
item.description: 白宫国家经济委员会主任凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）可能在今年年底前挑选下一任美联储主席的迹象作出了积极的市场反应，而总统的首席经济顾问被认为很有可能赢得这一职位。【原文：White House National Economic Council Director Kevin Hassett touted a positive market response to indications that Donald Trump could pick the next Federal Reserve chair before the end of the year — a job that the president’s chief economic adviser is seen as likely to win.】

item.title: 空中客车公司在今年最后几周面临宇宙干扰
item.description: 随着空中客车公司（Airbus SE）进入今年的最后一个月，这家欧洲飞机制造商正努力实现雄心勃勃的飞机交付目标，它发现自己面临着一个突如其来的新挑战。【原文：As Airbus SE enters the last month of the year trying to meet an ambitious aircraft delivery target, the European planemaker finds itself confronted with a fresh challenge that’s come out of the blue.】

item.title: 欧佩克+坚持在 2026 年初暂停增产的计划
item.description: 在全球石油市场出现越来越多过剩迹象的情况下，欧佩克+将坚持在第一季度暂停增产的计划。【原文：OPEC+ will stick with plans to pause production increases during the first quarter, amid growing signs of a surplus in global oil markets.】

item.title: 挪威预算谈判未果，内阁危机风险增大
item.description: 挪威执政党工党未能获得其所有政治伙伴对明年预算的支持，这使其在连任仅三个月后就面临政府危机的前景。【原文：Norway’s ruling Labor Party failed to secure backing for next year’s budget from all its political partners, raising the prospect of a government crisis just three months after its reelection.】

item.title: 意大利博罗梅奥家族列出岛屿清单，力争与科莫湖相媲美
item.description: 意大利博罗梅奥（Borromeo）家族正在将其持有的房地产，包括马焦雷湖（Lake Maggiore）上的一组岛屿上市，试图将该地区打造成一个旅游和商业中心，与附近的科莫湖相媲美。【原文：Italy’s Borromeo family is listing its real estate holdings including a group of islands on Lake Maggiore as it seeks to turn the area into a tourism and business hub to rival nearby Lake Como.】

item.title: 欧佩克+将就密切关注的产能审查机制达成协议
item.description: 预计欧佩克+成员国将就即将进行的各自石油生产能力审查程序达成一致，这将有助于确定 2027 年的产量配额。【原文：OPEC+ members are expected to agree on a procedure for an upcoming review of their individual oil production capacities, which will help set output quotas in 2027.】

item.title: 美国期权市场应对清算中的 "集中风险
item.description: 随着美国期权市场交易量连续第六年创下历史新高，业内一些知名人士对过度依赖少数银行为最大的做市商提供交易担保感到越来越紧张。【原文：As the US options market heads for a sixth straight year of record volume, some best-known names in the industry are growing nervous about its over-reliance on a small group of banks to guarantee trades for the biggest market makers.】

item.title: 对债券投资者而言，一些新兴市场比美国更安全
item.description: 全球债券投资者开始认为部分新兴市场比许多富裕国家更安全，这一重大转变为该资产类别下一阶段的优异表现奠定了基础。【原文：Global bond investors are beginning to view select emerging markets as safer than many far richer nations, a momentous shift that’s setting the stage for the next phase of outperformance in the asset class.】

item.title: 洪都拉斯人在特朗普试图影响的选举中投票
item.description: 洪都拉斯人在唐纳德-特朗普的压力下投票选举总统，在这次选举中，两位领跑者都承诺结束与北京的外交关系。【原文：Hondurans are voting for president under pressure from Donald Trump, in an election in which the two frontrunners pledge to end diplomatic ties with Beijing.】

item.title: 瑞士拒绝征收百万富翁遗产税 担心财富外流
item.description: 在富裕企业家威胁要离开瑞士之后，瑞士投票否决了对超级富裕居民征收 50%遗产税的提议。【原文：Switzerland voted to reject a 50% inheritance tax on super-rich residents after wealthy entrepreneurs threatened to leave the country.】

item.title: 澳大利亚房价涨幅扩大，负担能力恶化
item.description: 由于需求继续超过供应，澳大利亚房价在 11 月份扩大了涨幅，这种态势可能会增加通胀压力，并使该国央行无法进一步降息。【原文：Australian home prices extended gains in November as demand continued to outstrip supply, a dynamic that could add to inflation pressures and keep the country’s central bank from cutting interest rates further.】

item.title: 欧佩克+"开会评估市场，预计产量计划不变
item.description: 欧佩克+将于周日聚集在一起评估全球石油市场，在过剩迹象日益明显的情况下，产油国仍将在第一季度暂停增加供应。【原文：OPEC+ will gather to assess global oil markets on Sunday, with the producers still on track to pause supply increases in the first quarter amid growing signs of a surplus.】

item.title: 雷切尔-里夫斯否认在预算前谎报英国财政状况
item.description: 蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）否认在预算案公布前就英国公共财政状况误导英国公众，因为她在周三260亿英镑的增税方案公布前的信息传递一直受到批评。【原文：Rachel Reeves denied misleading the British public about the state of the UK’s public finances ahead of her budget, as she faced ongoing criticism over her messaging in the run-up to Wednesday’s £26 billion package of tax hikes.】

item.title: 挪威 2.1 万亿美元基金在人权投票中支持微软
item.description: 挪威2.1万亿美元的主权财富基金在一起涉及人权审查程序的争议案件中支持微软公司。【原文：Norway’s $2.1 trillion sovereign wealth fund is backing Microsoft Corp. in a controversial case involving its human rights vetting processes.】

item.title: 欧洲罕见地称霸全球股票排行榜
item.description: 在今年全球表现最好的 20 个股票市场中，每两个指数中就有一个是欧洲指数。【原文：In the ranks of the world’s 20 best-performing stock markets this year, every second index is European.】

item.title: 香港采取行动平息大楼火灾后的民愤
item.description: 香港发生了近八十年来最严重的火灾，造成至少 128 人死亡，并引发了对漏报警报的质疑。【原文：Hong Kong’s government moved to stamp out mounting public anger in the wake of the city’s deadliest fire in nearly eight decades, which left at least 128 people dead and raised questions about missed warnings.】

item.title: 印度航空公司完成 A320 软件升级：监管机构
item.description: 印度安全监管机构--民航总局周日表示，印度的航空公司已经完成了空客 320 系列飞机的紧急软件升级。【原文：The Directorate General of Civil Aviation, India’s safety regulator, Sunday said airlines in the country have completed urgent software upgrades of the Airbus 320 family of aircraft.】

item.title: Coupang 面临韩国最大规模数据黑客攻击调查
item.description: 韩国当局正在调查在线零售商 Coupang 公司的数据泄露事件，该事件暴露了约 3370 万个账户，这可能是韩国 5 170 万人口中范围最广的一次黑客攻击。【原文：South Korean authorities are investigating a data leak at online retailer Coupang Inc. that exposed about 33.7 million accounts in what could be the widest hack for the country of 51.7 million people.】

item.title: 中国工厂活动下滑创历史最长纪录
item.description: 随着中国经济放缓的加深，11 月份中国工厂活动有所改善，但仍处于萎缩状态，连降幅度创下新高。【原文：China’s factory activity improved but remained in contraction in November, extending its streak of declines to a record as the country’s economic slowdown deepens.】

item.title: 日本财务大臣称外汇走势并非基于基本面
item.description: 日本财务大臣片山聪树（Satsuki Katayama）表示，"很明显"，日元的剧烈波动并不是 "基于基本面的变动"，这是日本政府对货币感到失望的最新表现。【原文：Japan’s Finance Minister Satsuki Katayama said it is “clear” that volatile yen swings aren’t “moving based on fundamentals,” in the latest expression of the government’s frustration over the currency.】

item.title: 华尔街预测印度市场在经历艰难一年后将反弹
item.description: 在经历了几十年来印度市场表现最差的一年之后，华尔街的一些大公司正在呼吁市场反弹。【原文：After one of India’s worst years of market underperformance in decades, some of the biggest names on Wall Street are calling for a rebound.】

item.title: 布雷曼执掌新西兰央行，"天赋 "理想经济
item.description: 瑞典人安娜-布雷曼（Anna Breman）接替新西兰央行行长一职的时机非常理想。【原文：Sweden’s Anna Breman is taking the helm of New Zealand’s central bank at an ideal time, according to the man she’s replacing.】

item.title: 马里在达成结束矿山纠纷的协议后释放被拘留的巴里克员工
item.description: 巴里克矿业公司（Barrick Mining Corp. ）在马里的法律代表表示，作为与政府达成的协议的一部分，该公司在马里被拘留一年多的几名员工已于本周获释。【原文：Several Barrick Mining Corp. employees, who had been detained in Mali for more than a year, were released this week as part of a deal with the government, the company’s legal representative in the country said.】
